Row.Text: All coastal Cities get a free Harbor. Your Cargo Ships cannot be plundered. Units may cross mountains, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a mountain.
You must be at war against the trade route owner to plunder this unit.
Your opponent's unique ability prevents this unit from being plundered.
